name: Quality Issue
query:
SELECT
qi.name AS 'Name:Data:200',
qi.workflow_state AS 'Workflow State:Data:200',
qi.customer_name AS 'Customer Name:Data:200',
qi.customer_code AS 'Customer Code:Data:200',
qi.customer_location AS 'Customer Location:Data:200',
qi.customer_phone_number AS 'Customer Phone Number:Data:200',
qi.rsm_name AS 'RSM Name:Data:200',
qi.asm_name AS 'ASM Name:Data:200',
qi.indirect_customer_details AS 'Indirect Customer Details:Data:200',
qi.email_address_of_requestor_from_sales_team AS 'Email Address of Requestor from Sales Team:Data:200',
qi.type_of_issue AS 'Type of Issue:Data:200',
sd.sku_code AS 'SKU Code:Data:200',
sd.sku_name AS 'SKU Name:Data:200',
sd.quantity_in_pieces AS 'Quantity (in pieces):Data:200',
sd.mgf_date AS 'Mgf Date:Data:200',
sd.batch_details AS 'Batch Details:Data:200',
qi.manufacturing_plant AS 'Manufacturing Plant:Data:200',
qi.manufacturing_date AS 'Manufacturing Date:Data:200',
qi.invoice_number AS 'Invoice Number:Data:200',
qi.issue_details AS 'Issue Details:Data:200',
qi.physicalremote_verification_executive AS 'Physical/Remote Verification executive user:Data:200',
qi.physicalremote_verification_executive_email as 'Physical/Remote Verification executive email:Data:200'

FROM `tabQuality Issue` qi
Inner Join 
`tabSKU Details` sd
WHERE sd.parent = qi.name
ORDER BY
qi.name;
